ratings.comment: Daegan is a very interesting lecturer who is very passionate about history. Class provides very insightful information that I found interesting even though I only took this course to fulfill a requirement. The readings are kind of long but they are clarified in class and discussion section. I would recommend this course.

Daegan is pretty great!  Lectures are supposed to be mandatory, but I find they are easy to skip.  Weekly discussion is mandatory though. There are no tests and only short papers.  Big on class participation.

Professor Miller is relatable, kind, and open to discussion and opinions.  I'm sure this guy would be willing to talk about anything academic without forcing his opinion down your throat like some humanities professors.  Overall GREAT guy, highly recommend his class.

Great Professor! Prof. Miller truly cares about his students. You can tell he is a student at heart and knows how his students feel. No tests, just four small papers, a midterm paper, and final paper. The four small papers are just a page and a half long.  Lectures are fun and interesting. Just overall great guy!
